greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of times the digit 8 appears in the decimal expansion of n^3.
comment: The cubes corresponding to the first occurrence of 1, 2, 3, ... are listed in A036535, i.e., A036535(n)^(1/3) = A048373(n) is the index of the first occurrence of n.
xref: Analog for squares: A086016, and A086008 - A086017 for digits 0 - 9.
results.author: _M. F. Hasler_, Feb 20 2016
